{{ddcl | since=libfund_ts_3| 1=
std::pmr::polymorphic_allocator&lt;&gt; get_allocator() const noexcept;
}}

Returns the {{c|std::pmr::polymorphic_allocator&lt;&gt;}} stored at the construction of {{tt|function}} object. If no allocator was explicitly specified, the stored allocator is equal to the source allocator in move construction, or is default-constructed otherwise.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
The {{c|std::pmr::polymorphic_allocator&lt;&gt;}} stored at the construction of {{tt|function}} object.
